message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the $12000 range. Would you be willing to adjust your offer accordingly?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still very confident in the value this product can bring to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. It's a great compromise that still allows me to make a profit while giving you a good deal. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, I'm still unable to move beyond $12000 due to my financial constraints. I believe we've reached our maximum point of agreement. I will proceed to purchase the product from John at $12000.
